# Razorscales (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Components:** V, DF/M

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Serpent Kingdoms (WotC), pg. 157

Your scales become razor-sharp. While this spell is in effect, you deal lethal instead of nonlethal damage when grappling. If are not a Scaled One, this spell automatically fails.

*Material Component:* A thin-bladed razor.

**GM Note**

Note: This spell does not provide the caster with scales, it merely enhances them. The caster must have either natural scales or possess either a feat or be under a magical effect (spell or item) which provides them.
